intro: Monteverdia lucayana, commonly known as the Lucayan monteverdia, is a species of flowering plant native to the Caribbean region. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes milkweeds and related plants. It thrives in humid, tropical environments and is often found in coastal areas and limestone habitats. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
